      • fight

        public Pawn fight(Pawn attacker,
                  Pawn defender)
        Calculate the result of a fight between two pawns.

        Shows the fighting pawns to both players. When the fight is over the pawns are hidden for the opponent again.

        Overrides:
        fight in class Logic
        Parameters:
        attacker - The attacking pawn
        defender - The defending pawn
        Returns:
        Pawn The winner
        See Also:
        Logic.showPawn(Pawn), Logic.hidePawn(Pawn)
